ADDomain.title: Active Directory Domain
ADDomain.description: Defines the AD domain you're working with.

RecursiveGroupLookup.title: Recursive Group Lookup
RecursiveGroupLookup.description: If set to yes, group membership lookups should be done recursively

LDAPServers.description: List of LDAP servers that you would like to use for AD authentication instead of using SRV record lookup.

LDAPOverSSL.title: LDAP Over SSL
LDAPOverSSL.description: Determines if NoMAD Login uses LDAP over SSL.

AdditionalADDomains.title: Additional Active Directory Domains
AdditionalADDomains.description: List of domains to append at the loginwindow. If not set, the standard Managed Domain policy will apply.

AdditionalADDomainList.title: Domain Dropdown List
AdditionalADDomainList.description: List of LDAP servers to display in the pulldown menu in the Login Window. Users can select a domain from the menu and then only enter the shortname in the text field.

NTtoADDomainMappings.description: Maps NT to AD Domains. e.g. NOMAD: nomad.menu, would allow a user to sign in as "NOMAD\user" and that would be converted to "user@nomad.menu" before authenticating to AD.

EULATitle.title: End User License Agreement Title
EULATitle.description: Text for the large title in the EULA window.

EULASubTitle.title: End User License Agreement Subtitle
EULASubTitle.description: Text for a subtitle in the EULA window.

EULAText.title: End User License Agreement Text
EULAText.description: Text to present in the EULA window.

EULAPath.title: End User License Agreement Save Path
EULAPath.description: Path to save acceptance records to.

CreateAdminUser.title: Create Admin Users
CreateAdminUser.description: Will place any local user created at login by NoMAD Login in the local admin group.

CreateAdminIfGroupMember.title: Group Membership to Create Admin Users
CreateAdminIfGroupMember.description: List of groups that should have its members created as local administrators.

UseCNForFullName.title: Use User Common Name for Full Name
UseCNForFullName.description: Use the the user's CN from AD instead of attempting to create the user name from the first and last name attributes of the user's AD record.

UseCNForFullNameFallback.title: Use User Common Name for Full Name Fallback
UseCNForFullNameFallback.description: Uses the CN as the fullname on the account when the givenName and sn fields are blank

UserProfileImage.title: User Profile Image
UserProfileImage.description: Path to an image to set as the user profile image.

DemobilizeUsers.title: Demobilize Users
DemobilizeUsers.description: Will convert a previously cached mobile account from AD into a regular local user account on login.

DemobilizeSaveAltSecurityIdentities.title: Demobilize Preserve AllSecurityIdentities
DemobilizeSaveAltSecurityIdentities.description: If true, the AltSecurityIdentities user record attribute should be preserved, useful when moving from mobile accounts with smart card mapping implemented.

DemobilizeForcePasswordCheck.title: Demobilize Force Password Check
DemobilizeForcePasswordCheck.description: If true, a password input at the NoMAD login window will be required to demobilize

UserInputOutputPath.title: User Input / Output Path
UserInputOutputPath.description: Path where the userinfo.plist will be written.

UserInputLogo.title: User Input Logo
UserInputLogo.description: Path to a logo file to use for the UserInput mechanism.

UserInputUI.description: UI elements shown during the UserInput mechanism.

EnableFDE.title: Enable FileVault on APFS
EnableFDE.description: On systems using the APFS filesystem, this key will enable FileVault encryption as the user is signing in for the first time.

EnableFDERecoveryKey.title: Enable FileVault Recovery Key
EnableFDERecoveryKey.description: Write the output of the fdesetup command to /var/db/.NoMADFDESetup

LoginScreen.title: macOS Style Login Window
LoginScreen.description: If set to yes, a macOS-style loginscreen will be presented instead of the NoMAD Login loginwindow style.

UsernameFieldPlaceholder.title: Username Field Placeholder
UsernameFieldPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text to show in the username textfield.

LoginLogo.title: Login Logo
LoginLogo.description: Path to the logo to display on the login screen. If set to NONE, no logo will be shown.

LoginLogoData.title: Login Logo Data
LoginLogoData.description: Logo to display on the login screen.

LoginLogoAlpha.title: Login Logo Alpha
LoginLogoAlpha.description: Alpha value of the logo image.

BackgroundImage.title: Login Window Background Image
BackgroundImage.description: Path to the background image to be used.

BackgroundImageData.title: Background Image Data
BackgroundImageData.description: Background to display on the login screen.

BackgroundImageAlpha.title: Login Window Background Image Alpha
BackgroundImageAlpha.description: Alpha value of the background image.

AllowNetworkSelection.title: Show Network Selection
AllowNetworkSelection.description: If enabled, the network selection button is shown

DefaultSystemInformation.title: Default System Information
DefaultSystemInformation.description: Defines which system information should be showed on login window, by default

PowerControlDisabled.title: Hide Shutdown and Restart
PowerControlDisabled.description: If set to yes, hides the shutdown and restart buttons

ManageSecureTokens.title: Enable Secure Token Management
ManageSecureTokens.description: This key will enable SecureToken management capabilites in NomadLogin 1.4. This utilizes a service account which can be modified from default using the below optional preferences.

SecureTokenManagementEnableOnlyAdminUser.title: Enable Only Admin User
SecureTokenManagementEnableOnlyAdminUser.description: If enabled, the SecureToken service account will only enable administrative users created with NoMAD Login.

SecureTokenManagementOnlyEnableFirstUser.title: Only Enable First User
SecureTokenManagementOnlyEnableFirstUser.description: If enabled, NoMAD Login will only enable the first user that is eligable for a SecureToken, and delete the service account afterwards.

SecureTokenManagementPasswordLength.title: Service Account Password Length
SecureTokenManagementPasswordLength.description: Defines a custom SecureToken service account password length.

MessagePasswordSync.title: Password Sync Message
MessagePasswordSync.description: Message to show when the password needs to sync

UIDTool.title: UID Tool
UIDTool.description: String to determine the path of an executable that is run when a new user is created. It is expected to return the UID that the user should be created with. It passes in the new users username as the first argument, default is to use the built in functionality

GUIDTool.title: GUID Tool
GUIDTool.description: String to determine the path of an executable that is run when a new user is created. It is expected to return the GUID that the user should be created with. It passes in the new users username as the first argument, default is to use the built in functionality

NotifyLogStyle.title: Add Notify to Management Log File
NotifyLogStyle.description: Adds the appropriate log file to the the Notify mechanism.

KeychainCreate.title: Create Keychain
KeychainCreate.description: Create keychain if it does not exist.

KeychainAddNoMAD.title: Add NoMAD to Keychain
KeychainAddNoMAD.description: Add a NoMAD entry into the keychain.

CustomNoMADLocation.title: Custom NoMAD Location
CustomNoMADLocation.description: If defined it specifies the custom location of the application to be given access to the keychain item.

LastUser.title: Last User Shortname
LastUser.description: Shortname of the last user to login. This allows NoMAD to login on first launch.

KeychainReset.title: Reset Keychain if Password Doesn't Match
KeychainReset.description: Reset keychain if login password doesn't match.

GuestUserAccounts.title: Guest User Accounts
GuestUserAccounts.description: List of names that can be entered into the username field to trigger a guest user creation

GuestUserAccountPasswordPath.title: Guest User Password Path
GuestUserAccountPasswordPath.description: The path to write out the guest users randomly generated password

GuestUserFirst.title: Guest User First Name
GuestUserFirst.description: Defines the first name of the guest user account

GuestUserLast.title: Guest User Last Name
GuestUserLast.description: Defines the last name of the guest user account
